test.common

Class HTMLManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • test.common.HTMLManager

  • public class HTMLManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods to log informations into HTML document.

      static void addBody(java.lang.String s)

      static void buildFile(java.io.PrintStream out)
      Write all strings (headString + indexString + indexClosingString + bodyString + closingString) on the HTML file
      static int getBlockCounter()
      Return a counter of the blocks in body section: each block identifies a Run or RunAll execution

      Increments the counter of the blocks in body section

      Creates a new instance of htmlManager
